photoOpenedText.h5: From the archives of post-colonial history to the logic of modern interfaces. My journey is a synthesis of discipline in the ring, curiosity in the field, and precision in the code.

developer.h5: My foundation as a Frontend Engineer. Regardless of how the environment shifts, my commitment to clean code and seamless user experiences remains the constant thread in my work.

muayThai.h5: Muay Thai has taught me that resilience is key—both in the gym and while debugging complex React applications. It’s about staying focused under pressure.

heritage.h5: Obsessed with the remnants of the past. I see technology as a vital tool for preserving and reinterpreting cultural narratives for the digital age.

architecture.h5: Analyzing colonial architecture informs my critical perspective on how digital products can shape, or reshape, global and local identities.

devotion.h5: As a historical researcher and a believer in Buddhist and Taoist traditions, I stand at the intersection of spiritual heritage and academic inquiry, seeking stories etched in sacred spaces.
